chart.title: Global aviation demand, energy efficiency and CO₂ emissions
chart.note: Carbon emissions are measured in carbon-dioxide equivalents, without adjustment for additional warming at altitude.
chart.citation: Bergero et al. (2023). Pathways to net-zero emissions from aviation.
